subject: all the meditation colors
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Visualize red-oragnge-yellow-green-blue-violet. You have to be able to
actually see the colors in the minds eye. I like to go out
--non-physically-- and look at stuff like this to see the colors, it
enhances psychic ability.

 F-S
